Title: Staff Infection
Plot: When Michael discovers his family has been receiving paychecks without working, he forces them all to get jobs within the company. Lindsay questions his management skills, and Tobias checks himself in at George Sr.'s prison to research a film role.
GuestStars: Matt Price, Alden Villaverde, Michael Blieden, BW Gonazalez, David Reynolds, James Lipton, Bradley Stryker
